FuncDef: The display ftp server ip-block list command displays information about client IP addresses that are locked because of FTP authentication failures. The display ftp server ip-block list command displays information about client IP addresses that are locked because of FTP authentication failures.
ExtraInfo: To check information about client IP addresses that are locked because of FTP authentication failures, run the display ftp server ip-block list command. The command output includes the names of VPN instances to which the locked client IP addresses belong and the remaining locking period.
